original_text: Moses and Aaron recorded the descendants of Kohath who worked at the Tent of Meeting. The Lord had told Moses that they must do that.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 회막에서 종사하는 고핫인의 모든 종족 중 계수된 자이니라

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron recorded the descendants of Kohath
who worked at the Tent of Meeting
